Excluded.Name: test-cluster.+\.js
Excluded.Description: cluster module support planned but not implemented.

Excluded.Name: test-debug.+\.js
Excluded.Description: Debug module support requires V8 and won't be implemented.

Excluded.Name: test-c-ares.js
Excluded.Description: This is a wrapper around some native code.

Excluded.Name: test-http-unix-socket.js
Excluded.Reason: UNIX sockets are not supported in Noderunner or in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-http-client-pipe-end.js
Excluded.Description: Pipes are not supported in Noderunner or in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-http-client-response-domain.js
Excluded.Description: Pipes are not supported in Noderunner or in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-fs-write-file-sync.js
Excluded.Description: Relies too much on Unix file permissions

Excluded.Name: test-fs-chmod.js
Excluded.Description: Relies too much on Unix file permissions

Excluded.Name: test-fs-error-messages.js
Excluded.Description: Tests stuff that we don't support like symlinks.

Excluded.Name: test-fs-symlink-.+\.js
Excluded.Description: No symlinks in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-fs-realpath.js
Excluded.Description: No symlinks in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-fs-utimes.js
Excluded.Description: Can't set utimes in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-fs-watch.+
Excluded.Description: Depends on native stuff.

Excluded.Name: test-umask.js
Excluded.Description: Can't set that in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-net-listen-fd0.js
Excluded.Description: Listening on a file descriptor is not supported in Noderunner or Java.

Excluded.Name: test-net-pingpong.js
Excluded.Description: Listening on a file descriptor is not supported in Noderunner or Java.

Excluded.Name: test-net-pipe-connect-errors.js
Excluded.Description: No pipes in NR or Java.

Excluded.Name: test-crypto.js
Excluded.Description: Noderunner version supports only Java ciphers and other stuff for now.

Excluded.Name: test-tls-.+\.js
Excluded.Description: All TLS tests are run from the "noderunner" directory because they use a different keystore format.

Excluded.Name: test-buffer.js
Excluded.Description: Relies on internal details of Node buffer implementation, like negative "sourceStart" in copy. Copy in noderunner test dir.

Excluded.Name: test-buffer-ascii.js
Excluded.Description: Relies on Node's way of converting non-8-bit ASCII by stripping the high bits. Java does it differently unless we custom code it.

Excluded.Name: test-https-.+\.js
Excluded.Description: All HTTPS tests are run from the "noderunner" directory because they use a different keystore format.

Excluded.Name: test-pipe-address.js
Excluded.Reason: UNIX sockets are not supported in Noderunner or in Java.

Excluded.Name: test-http-client-timeout-event.js
Excluded.Description: Timeouts are too short -- assumes connection is opened in 1 ms. Change second timeout to 100 ms and it works fine.

Excluded.Name: test-https-pfx.js
Excluded.Description: Depends on internal SSL errors and cert parsing code.

Excluded.Name: test-tcp-wrap.+
Excluded.Description: Internal Node module.

Excluded.Name: test-process-wrap.js
Excluded.Description: Internal Node module.

Excluded.Name: test-cli-eval.js
Excluded.Description: Depends on different command-line params.

Excluded.Name: test-eval.js
Excluded.Description: Depends on different command-line params.

Excluded.Name: test-executable-path.js
Excluded.Description: Depends on different command-line params.

Excluded.Name: test-eval-require.js
Excluded.Description: We don't support the same command-line params.

Excluded.Name: test-require-json.js
Excluded.Reason: Checks against an error message when trying to parse JSON; Rhino and v8 generate different ones
